subtitle.Text: Todd says he sucked, Lonnie says he got sick of Todd's shit--
and he was complaining about needing a new singer, so Lonnie was like, "I can sing!" And they were all kind of like, "you can??" And she was like, "probably!"
But she's been rehearsing with them for like a week now, and I finally got to see them play in Todd's basement today,
I feel so... proud when she's onstage. It's incredible being in awe of somebody you love.
Everybody knows it's like, a temporary situation, til she ships out in June. But til then... I'm gonna be at every single show.
